entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 a.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
